title.en: Biographies of Wan Shi and Zhang Shu
title.raw: 《萬石張叔列傳》 Biographies of Wan Shi and Zhang Shu

sentences.zh: 萬石君名奮，其父趙人也，姓石氏。

translations.text: Wan Shi Jun named Fen, his father Zhao person, surname Shi clan.

sentences.zh: 趙亡，徙居溫。

translations.text: Zhao perished, moved dwell Wen.

sentences.zh: 高祖東擊項籍，過河內，時奮年十五，為小吏，侍高祖。

translations.text: Gao Zu east strike Xiang Ji, pass He Nei, at time Fen year fifteen, become small li, serve Gao Zu.

sentences.zh: 高祖與語，愛其恭敬，問曰：「若何有？」

translations.text: Gao Zu with speak, love his respectful reverence, ask said: 'You have what?'

sentences.zh: 對曰：「奮獨有母，不幸失明。

translations.text: Answer said: 'Fen alone have mother, unfortunately lose sight.

sentences.zh: 家貧。

translations.text: Family poor.

sentences.zh: 有姊，能鼓琴。」

translations.text: Have elder sister, able drum zither.'

sentences.zh: 高祖曰：「若能從我乎？」

translations.text: Gao Zu said: 'You able follow me?'

sentences.zh: 曰：「願盡力。」

translations.text: Said: 'Wish exhaust strength.'

sentences.zh: 於是高祖召其姊為美人，以奮為中涓，受書謁，徙其家長安中戚裏，以姊為美人故也。

translations.text: Then Gao Zu summon his elder sister become beauty, with Fen become zhong jian, receive book ye, move his family Chang An Zhong Qi Li, with elder sister become beauty reason.

sentences.zh: 其官至孝文時，積功勞至大中大夫。

translations.text: His official reach Xiao Wen time, accumulate merit labor reach da zhong da fu.

sentences.zh: 無文學，恭謹無與比。

translations.text: No literature, respectful cautious no equal compare.

Wan Shi Jun named Fen, his father Zhao person, surname Shi clan. Zhao perished, moved dwell Wen. Gao Zu east strike Xiang Ji, pass He Nei, at time Fen year fifteen, become small li, serve Gao Zu. Gao Zu with speak, love his respectful reverence, ask said: 'You have what?' Answer said: 'Fen alone have mother, unfortunately lose sight. Family poor. Have elder sister, able drum zither.' Gao Zu said: 'You able follow me?' Said: 'Wish exhaust strength.' Then Gao Zu summon his elder sister become beauty, with Fen become zhong jian, receive book ye, move his family Chang An Zhong Qi Li, with elder sister become beauty reason. His official reach Xiao Wen time, accumulate merit labor reach da zhong da fu. No literature, respectful cautious no equal compare.

sentences.zh: 文帝時，東陽侯張相如為太子太傅，免。

translations.text: Wen Di time, Dong Yang Hou Zhang Xiang Ru become crown prince tai fu, free.

sentences.zh: 選可為傅者，皆推奮，奮為太子太傅。

translations.text: Select able become fu, all push Fen, Fen become crown prince tai fu.

sentences.zh: 及孝景即位，以為九卿；

translations.text: Reach Xiao Jing establish, become nine qing;

sentences.zh: 迫近，憚之，徙奮為諸侯相。

translations.text: Press close, fear him, move Fen become feudal lord xiang.

sentences.zh: 奮長子建，次子甲，次子乙，次子慶，皆以馴行孝謹，官皆至二千石。

translations.text: Fen long son Jian, next son Jia, next son Yi, next son Qing, all with tame conduct filial cautious, officials all reach two thousand dan.

sentences.zh: 於是景帝曰：「石君及四子皆二千石，人臣尊寵乃集其門。」

translations.text: Then Jing Di said: 'Shi Jun and four sons all two thousand dan, person minister honor favor then collect his gate.'

sentences.zh: 號奮為萬石君。

translations.text: Number Fen become Wan Shi Jun.

Wen Di time, Dong Yang Hou Zhang Xiang Ru become crown prince tai fu, free. Select able become fu, all push Fen, Fen become crown prince tai fu. Reach Xiao Jing establish, become nine qing; Press close, fear him, move Fen become feudal lord xiang. Fen long son Jian, next son Jia, next son Yi, next son Qing, all with tame conduct filial cautious, officials all reach two thousand dan. Then Jing Di said: 'Shi Jun and four sons all two thousand dan, person minister honor favor then collect his gate.' Number Fen become Wan Shi Jun.

sentences.zh: 孝景帝季年，萬石君以上大夫祿歸老于家，以歲時為朝臣。

translations.text: Xiao Jing Di last years, Wan Shi Jun with shang da fu lu return old at home, with year season become court minister.

translations.text: Pass palace gate que, Wan Shi Jun must descend chariot hasten, see road horse must shi.
